one_reviews_text: you cannot move, no traveling LOL
Nice atmosphere, but not really worth the price. Very anticlimactic.

So this is basically a music experience with a stationary viewpoint of a vibrant world around you.  The normal and Halloween mode have the same basic scene, however all the details are different.  There is a day and night cycle for both experiences.  I hope they do a similar update for winter.  That will more than justify the normal price.  What sets this app apart from many others is that you can listen to your own music as well.  I was slightly disappointed that my touch controllers did not do anything, you have these wooden things as your hands but I didn't see a function for them.  Nonetheless, I enjoyed the experience and easily got my $3 worth of entertainment.
An enjoyale fantasy travelling, pretty colour & scenery. Under $3 will be a reasonable price for this app.
I really really enjoyed it, would like to see more from this creator!
review_feedback: Thank you for the great review! We're looking forward to making more levels/experiences for ITA in the future. Right now we're working on a new project, "Seance: The Unquiet". You can check out our preview (it's free) if you like. Thanks again! We really appreciate your kind words.

one_reviews_text: I don't think it's worth the price.

I debated buying this for a while.  I can't believe I paid for it.  I was looking for an experience I could kind of meditate and relax to.  

All I could think of was the terrible graphics and design.   The world was full of physics flaws, such as the two moons being half moons, even though the sun was right underneath them, and the comet was flying sideways even though it wasn't tracking with the stars. 

It doesn't help that the music got angry in the middle

Also, I expected more than one experience.   WTF?
And even if it was demo it wouldn't be a great one.

I'm glad i got this title on sale and even so I don't think it's worth the money. You can get more interesting experiences for free.
To be honest, i was bored on the verge of falling to sleep.
Too much money for what was basically a few minutes of standing on some cliff spire thing. I expected at least a few scenarios to experience.
